io.amcp.core.impl

Class SimpleAgent

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.amcp.core.impl.SimpleAgent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Agent, Serializable

    public class SimpleAgent
extends Object
implements Agent
    Simple implementation of Agent for AMCP v1.5. Provides basic agent functionality and can be extended for specific use cases.
    Since:
    AMCP 1.5.0
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
